'''Honored Guest of the Realm''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[A Realm Beyond: Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to Invite a companion to stay in their [[Serenitea Pot]].

==Notes==
* The World Quest [[Idle Teapot Talk]] should be done in order to unlock the Companion Move-In feature.
